column4: why would camorama show an error for /dev/video0 when mplayer works fine?
then go to video and test the default input
v4l shows "could not read from resource" and v4l2 "could not negotiate format"
sorry, i'm not sure what you can do...try googling "ubuntu [webcam model]"
the strange thing is "mplayer /dev/video0" works fine
mplayer doesn't use the gstreamer framework. what's strange is that mplayer works and gstreamer doesn't.
ok ill search more, it is capture card WinTV PCR-150
when you got the gstreamer error, was anything else (mplayer) open using the device?
nope, it was all closed down
sorry, i'm just guessing at this point.
thats okay, thanks for the tips, gives me something more to go on :)
now it is working in VLC using PVR mode
try gstreamer-properties again and see if there are other options for your default video input
only options are test, v4l, v4l2, and custom. tried using "pvr://" for custom, but there is an error "no source element for uri"
ah, then the problem must be with v4l2, which i have no idea how to deal with, sorry
ah okay, will look to see what other v4l2 options exist
